nodes.text: Quoltus Firth was a human, who was once a musician. After his daughter, Aquella Firth began dating Niklas Cories, a young man who helped out for the band Distraction, Quoltus tried to stop her. After she ran away to go to a Distraction concert, Quoltus hired a group of spacers to investigate Cories. He was owed a favor by Zim Zimley, a Bith who was the manager of the band, so he persuaded Zimley to hire the spacers, to provide extra security during a Distraction concert.
